languages.text: Засмеялся Неумирающий, ибо тленом были против Него все враги Его.
The Undying One laughed, for all His enemies were but dust compared to Him.
languages.original_text: Засмеялся Неумирающий, ибо тленом были против Него все враги Его.

traits.locale_text: The Undying One laughed, for all His enemies were but dust compared to Him.

languages.text: Der Todlose lachte, denn alle seine Feinde waren im Vergleich zu ihm nur Staub.
languages.original_text: The Undying One laughed, for all His enemies were but dust compared to Him.

traits.locale_text: Der Todlose lachte, denn alle seine Feinde waren im Vergleich zu ihm nur Staub.

languages.text: El Inmortal rio, pues Sus enemigos no son más que polvo comparados con Él.
languages.original_text: The Undying One laughed, for all His enemies were but dust compared to Him.

traits.locale_text: El Inmortal rio, pues Sus enemigos no son más que polvo comparados con Él.

languages.text: 不死の者が笑う。主の敵はすべて、自らに比較すれば塵でしかないのだから。
languages.original_text: The Undying One laughed, for all His enemies were but dust compared to Him.

traits.locale_text: 不死の者が笑う。主の敵はすべて、自らに比較すれば塵でしかないのだから。

languages.text: 不死之神大笑起来，因为与祂相比，祂所有的敌人都不过是尘土而已。
languages.original_text: The Undying One laughed, for all His enemies were but dust compared to Him.

traits.locale_text: 不死之神大笑起来，因为与祂相比，祂所有的敌人都不过是尘土而已。

languages.text: L'Immortel rit, car comparé à Lui, Ses ennemis ne sont que poussière.
languages.original_text: The Undying One laughed, for all His enemies were but dust compared to Him.

traits.locale_text: L'Immortel rit, car comparé à Lui, Ses ennemis ne sont que poussière.

languages.text: Ölmeyen kahkaha attı. Çünkü kendisine kıyasla tüm düşmanları toz tanesinden ibaretti.
languages.original_text: The Undying One laughed, for all His enemies were but dust compared to Him.
